text: Tapa'i bhanidinus ki he manisaharu timro palanakartabata timro che'uma satya a'isakeko cha, tasartha jo margadarsana prapta garna cahancha, usale pathapradarsanabata aphnai nimti bhalo gardacha ra jasale margavicalanako bato apana'umcha usale pathavicalanabata aphnai noksani gardacha ra ma timro hakima ho'ina
